attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recession is the worst since 1930s and the recovery then was only achieved by the second world war.
We do not want war but we want recovery.
The reason war created recovery was that orders were placed.
In a climate of increasing orders confidence is generated that allows entrepreneurs to buy more vans and take on staff.
The only institutions that can give orders,are the ministry of defence, the NHS, Government departments etc.
Do not give money to banks who will only hoard it, and no one has the confidence to take on debt.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
